hypothesis_content.title: MSTR Extreme Daily Deviation from NAV Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When MicroStrategy (MSTR) stock price deviates >8% from its estimated Bitcoin NAV (Net Asset Value) intraday, it will revert >50% of that deviation within 3 trading sessions with 70% probability, during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: MSTR trades as a Bitcoin proxy with an embedded option on corporate Bitcoin strategy. Extreme premiums/discounts to NAV create arbitrage opportunities for institutional players through redemption mechanisms or relative value trading. The reversion is faster in neutral/bull regimes as market efficiency is higher.
entry_conditions: BTC 1-day price change between -3% and +5% (no extreme BTC move)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 50% of initial deviation captured OR deviation reduced to <3%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Deviation expands by additional 3% from entry point

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 35% of trades hit stop loss before take profit in 2024-2025 data, OR average holding period exceeds 5 days for 50% reversion.
